title: UI is unresponsive on macOS after getting back from sleep mode

labels.name: priority 1: high
labels.description: an issue that is extremely important to fix, that interferes with the majority of users, occurs ofte

body:
when opening app after 12 hours mac has slept, UI is freezing, no CPU usage, UI just unresponsive

i can hide and show the app, cursor is changing when i hover elements, but on click nothing happens
one more interesting fact when i switch between chrome and status app, screen in status app is rerendered, but still can't click
it seems it reacts to clicks just doesn't re-render screen
so i can click, switch to chrome switch back and there will be new screen in status app

it happens every morning when i open macbook and look at status app

https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/11790366/128456864-8bf7cd2c-f49c-4a37-beab-c76e3d5c6d06.mov


seems related : https://forum.qt.io/topic/104804/qt5-hanging-crashing-problems-when-window-is-not-active-on-macos/2
I cannot replicate this in beta.1, please reopen if you're still experiencing this
ok first morning, it's still working, lets see tomorrow, @iurimatias do we know what was the reason? and how it was fixed ?
can confirm works fine 3 days in a row
it's back :(
probably it's different, it hangs when you have lots of messages and trying to switch between chats
unfortunately just reproduced on today's master, when i click, nothing happens, but if i hide and show the app, i can see new screen
latest master has a lot of thread related fixes that should fix/help with this
its here again :(
possibly related to #2012, I'm gonna try to replicate

i think for understanding the issue, this might be useful
```
the app reacts to clicks just doesn't re-render the screen
so I can click, switch to chrome switch back and there will be a new screen in the status app
cpu or gpu isn't used, so the app is not busy
```
https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/11790366/128456864-8bf7cd2c-f49c-4a37-beab-c76e3d5c6d06.mov
@iurimatias ^^ probably we should ask Qt experts, if they have any thoughts
@flexsurfer is this beta.11 or master?
master
there is a possible fix that was merged today
I can't replicate this anymore with the latest master, the fix to close open sockets probably fixed it. will tentatively close this issue for now.
still in latest master
@flexsurfer could you send us the log of around the time it crashed please?
it's not crashing it just doesn't re-render the screen https://github.com/status-im/status-desktop/issues/705#issuecomment-893995966
@flexsurfer logs will still help,that particular issue I can't replicate so logs is the only thing we can have to investigate this.
@iurimatias is there a docs how to get logs and where to send ?

@flexsurfer not yet sorry, but the log will be in the same directory where the binary runs, if in master this should be the root of `./bin` if in the system then it should be in `/Applications/Status.app/Contents/MacOS`

> the log will be in the same directory where the binary runs, if in master this should be the root of `./bin` if in the system then it should be in `/Applications/Status.app/Contents/MacOS`

That’s no longer the case because of #3248.
@iurimatias unfortunately there is nothing in logs, only lots of `callPrivateRPC` and `Verifying mailserver connection state...`
@flexsurfer are you still experiencing this in master lately?
yes, i have to restart app every morning
https://forum.qt.io/topic/104804/qt5-hanging-crashing-problems-when-window-is-not-active-on-macos/2
still relevant in latest master
